title: Synthesis, antibacterial activity, and mechanistic characterization of novel 9-substituted berberine derivatives.
abstract: Natural products serve as valuable sources for developing antibacterial agents. In this study, 35 berberine derivatives were synthesized, and preliminary screening revealed that most compounds effectively inhibited the growth of Methicillin-resistant
